Text: REPST John Well i am glad that you are still with the firm I know how you feel cause i have friends at Enron who tell me the same thing Infact my brother works for UBS Warburg in London and he does not know whats going on also I am working with a few recruiters but have not received good leads from them Actually I never thanked Andy Zipper for referring me to MRE so i would appreciate if you could let him know how much that helped me out Hope things turn out for the best for you Bilal From To Subject RE Date Wed Jan It is good to hear from you Bilal I hope things are going well Good luck with talking to everyone I guess the only advise I have is to keep sending out resumes Go to all the web based recruiting sites and send out your resume to anything that looks interesting Also talk to a recruiter as well Are you working with one now Anyway nothing is going on here Just waiting around I hate it I guess I feel lucky to have a job They are not communicating very well with the employees I cant wait until all of this is over Take care and let me know if you need anything John Original Message From bilal bajwa ENRON Sent Wednesday January PM To Griffith John Subject Hi John Hope you had great holidays I just wanted to update you on my progress I returned on Jan th after taking some time off from job search and have been in active discussion with MRE Consulting and Dynegy Although I have not received an offer from either I am hopeful At Caminus I emailed Debbie and unfortunately I could not set up a time to meet her before New Years She has been on vacation since then and i am looking forward to meeting her when she gets back I think after Caminus I would feel comfortable making a decision Do you have any suggestionsthoughts Once again thanks a lot for looking out for me Bilal Send and receive Hotmail on your mobile device This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp

PST Hi John Hope you had great holidays I just wanted to update you on my progress I returned on Jan th after taking some time off from job search and have been in active discussion with MRE Consulting and Dynegy Although I have not received an offer from either I am hopeful At Caminus I emailed Debbie and unfortunately I could not set up a time to meet her before New Years She has been on vacation since then and i am looking forward to meeting her when she gets back I think after Caminus I would feel comfortable making a decision Do you have any suggestionsthoughts Once again thanks a lot for looking out for me Bilal Send and receive Hotmail on your mobile device

Hi John I hope things are going well for you Sorry I could not contact you earlier had been really busy wrapping up things Thanks for stopping the other day and inquiring about me I have an H visa and have weeks to find a job after which I will be required to leave the country I am attaching a copy of my resume for you to review I would appreciate greatly if you could go over it and offer any suggestions on how I can improve my chances of finding a job Thanks Bilal MSN Photos is the easiest way to share and print your photos supportworldwideaspx Bilal Bajwa Resumedoc
